title: Filmmaker in residence finds inspiration in 50th anniversary year (Brunel University)
text: ( Source : Brunel University ) Meghan Horvath has been named Brunel 's new filmmaker in residence Brunel's brutalist backdrop will provide the inspiration for a unique filmmaking project celebrating the university's 50th Anniversary year. But
